name: MyQuickStart
title: My Quick Start
author: NM9311
description:
My Quick Start Mod:
Start with one of 9 startup kits(Empty, Default, Default-militant, Tiny, Small, Medium, Big, Huge or CUSTOM) to improve or decrease your Factorio experience. The kit can be selected in the mod config settings (Settings/Mod settings/Per Player). You can also choose to put items from kit to your quickbar.
